title: Local town classic drama
review:
The story keeps your attention throughout the entire movie following the lives of a true American family.
Funny, emotional, and heartwarming !

title: Low budget but the story makes it great
review: I love stories like this. Especially being from the northeast I've definitely relate to the setting. I would recommend to anyone who is dealing wish family issues of this kind. The acting was superb and at times It gets a little cringy but I think it is a great understanding of certain family situations

title: Pretty good for an indie flick
review: Didnt expect much but the story and characters were my focus. New England folks will enjoy it. I did.
